name: Alice Monroe
bio: Experienced tech writer and editor. Loves newsletters, long-form research, and making complex ideas approachable.

name: Ben Ortega
bio: Data journalist focusing on trends in tech and open data. Occasional visualizer and coffee enthusiast.

name: Carla Nguyen
bio:
Researcher and guest author. Writes about ethics, AI, and design.

Loves collaboration and good footnotes.
